If you run a hospital, a bank, a utility or a city, chances are you'll be hit with a ransomware attack. Given the choice between losing your precious data or paying up, chances are you'll pay. 
Why … [+5642 chars]

articles.author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
articles.title: Indonesia's internet start-ups Gojek and Tokopedia announce merger - CNBC
articles.description: Andre Soelistyo, group CEO of GoTo Group, told CNBC the immediate goal is to improve product experience for customers, drivers and merchants in Indonesia.
articles.content:
Indonesia ride-hailing and payments firm Gojek on Monday announced its merger with e-commerce player Tokopedia to form the GoTo Group.
Without disclosing the value of the transaction, Gojek claimed … [+3236 chars]
